properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:02PM CST until January 27 at 2:24PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for most of the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark
* from Tuesday January 14 until Sunday January 26.
* At 6 PM Monday the stage was 40.4 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 45.5 feet on Wednesday January 22.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Tuesday January 14 and
continue to rise to near 45.5 feet by Wednesday January 22.The
river will fall below flood stage by Sunday January 26.
* At 46.0 feet...In Mississippi, Charlie Lane is beginnin to flood,
and JT's bait shop is inundated. Margie Road and the north end of
Bennie Lane are flooding. West end of Betty Lane is under water.
House lots south of Doris Lane are going under water. Candy Loop is
being covered. Fields inside the levee west of Hambrick Road are
flooded. Farmstead north of Blue Point is flooding.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
